meanings.definition: To make a grimace or contorted facial expression.
meanings.sent1: She was girning in pain after stubbing her toe.
meanings.sent2: He girned when he tasted the bitter medicine.
meanings.sent3: The clown's girning face made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her face was girning like a twisted mask of agony.
meanings.sent5: The actor's girning expression conveyed intense emotion.

meanings.sent1: The cat's girning kept us awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The girning of the engine signaled a problem.
meanings.sent3: The girning of the wind outside made the house feel haunted.
meanings.sent4: The constant girning of the child annoyed the other passengers.
meanings.sent5: The eerie girning echoed through the empty hallway.
